programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to reopen a missing persons case he worked as a rookie officer; a victim in one of Carisi's recent cases is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty; Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl is shot and Cosgrove teams with Detective Jalen Shaw to track down her killer; Benson and Stabler assist and realize it's more than a typical homicide; McCoy and Price seek justice against an international crime ring; part 2 of 3.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A group of teens terrorizing tourists has the SVU squad working overtime; McGrath teams them up with the Bronx gang unit to track down a crucial lead.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Alexandra Cabot questions a pediatrician (Judd Hirsch) about a dead baby found in a cooler in the East River.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler hunts for a missing 14-year-old girl who may have been abducted by a foreign child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler look for a killer with a foot fetish.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young boy witnesses the brutal sexual assault and murder of his mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Fred Savage) accused of rape becomes a formidable opponent when he decides to handle his own defense.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A series of brutal home invasion robberies finds the team paired with Detective Borkowski, an old friend of Ruzek's, to work the case; things get complicated for Torres when it becomes clear Borkowski has a vastly different policing style.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A shocking ambush at a funeral leads the team into a heated investigation to find the shooters; much to Atwater's surprise, he must rely on someone from his past to help in the investigation, dredging up old memories and revealing new truths.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Sean O'Neal surprises Upton with a call from prison, revealing sensitive information; while Upton grapples with how to keep O'Neal at a distance, the team quickly mobilizes to stop a crime in progress before it's too late.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team help ASA Nina Chapman pursue a drug runner who dodged prison years ago after Chapman's informant mysteriously disappeared; the investigation takes a turn when Voight uncovers a damaging secret from Chapman's past.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a brutal shooting, Burgess and Ruzek find themselves trapped aboard the busy "L" subway; as they piece together scant evidence, the team is drawn into a dark family drama; Burgess' proximity to the shooting triggers harsh memories.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a family is poisoned in their home, the team discovers a connection to the Becks; Ruzek goes undercover to work for their business, and as he gets closer to Samantha, chilling information about her father, Richard, comes to light.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight takes the stand in a high-stakes murder trial against notorious drug kingpin Arturo Morales; when it becomes clear that Morales and his henchmen have compromised a juror, Voight and the team work furiously to ensure justice prevails.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: An annoying floater takes a romantic interest in Violet; Ritter catches a local politician in a compromising position; Mouch and Severide help Trudy with an arson investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Kidd, Seager and Carver investigate a fire at the city stables; Kylie clashes with some of the firefighters over changes due to budget cuts; Herrmann struggles to keep it together as Cindy's condition worsens.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz feels the burden of his increased responsibilities; Kidd, Gallo and Carver get caught in the middle of a gang war on a call; Herrmann wrangles Trudy for help lifting Cindy's mood.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mouch builds a classic firetruck model for the Deputy District Chief but needs assistance from Gallo and Ritter; Brett and Violet encounter multiple victims with a strange set of symptoms; Cindy's chemotherapy results loom over the Herrmann family.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A familiar face returns to Firehouse 51 to serve with Kidd on a special task force; with Tony close to breaking the CFD's perfect attendance record, Mouch and Capp work to keep him safe; old grudges resurface when Gallo reunites with a family member.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden, Ritter, Herrmann and Kidd work together to take down a local politician responsible for a chemical fire; after his aunt's accident, Gallo worries about their future; Brett steps in to perform Dylan's magic show when he's out of town.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Herrmann works on becoming a better man after Cindy's cancer journey; Kidd bonds with a homeless victim on a call; Kylie takes her firefighter exams; a harrowing call takes a toll on Brett.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: A man and his ex-wife race to Bali, Indonesia, to stop their daughter from marrying a seaweed farmer. As they desperately try to sabotage the wedding, the bickering duo soon find themselves rekindling old feelings that once made them happy together.

programme.title: About My Father
programme.desc: Encouraged by his fiancee, a man and his father spend the weekend with her wealthy and exceedingly eccentric family. The gathering soon develops into a culture clash, allowing father and son to discover the true meaning of family.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: A man and his ex-wife race to Bali, Indonesia, to stop their daughter from marrying a seaweed farmer. As they desperately try to sabotage the wedding, the bickering duo soon find themselves rekindling old feelings that once made them happy together.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Evidence points to an angry ex-boyfriend when a cocktail waitress is murdered outside a popular nightspot.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives face off against a Colombian cartel and the Drug Enforcement Administration while investigating the brutal rape and murder of an undercover agent.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When weapons worth $1 million are stolen, the team tracks the evidence to a charity event; Mosley gets herself added to the event's guest list, bringing Callen and Sam along as her security detail.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Sam goes under cover as a day trader after an investment banker who has ties to Russia is murdered; one of Callen's aliases is the victim of credit card theft.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: LAPD Detective Whiting calls in a favor when Deeks' former partner goes rogue.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A boy, 5, is abducted from his bed in the middle of the night, prompting detectives to take a hard look at the boy's estranged father.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives interrogate a man who accuses his wife (Josie Bissett) of endangering the life of their unborn child through excessive drinking.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the murder of a gay man who was the poster boy for sexual re-education.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a man's mutilation on the subway, detectives discover he has been abducting women for years and forcing them to live in his dungeon.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler and Capt. Cragen search for suspects after a missing infant is discovered badly beaten in the bushes at a local park.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A standoff in a motel on the Jersey Shore incites a pedophile to take detective Benson hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives investigate the rape and murder of two Arab-American women who were trying to improve relations among different groups.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives probe what looks like the ritualistic sacrifice of a 7-year-old Nigerian boy and uncover a slave-smuggling ring.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After finding out a dead teenage girl was a bully, detectives look for murder suspects at her school.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A child dies in the emergency room after passing out during a prayer vigil at a late-night church service.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives try to decipher a motive for the strangulation of a Bronx assistant DA in an area where hookers stroll.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A mother becomes Stabler and Benson's prime suspect in the poisoning of her child; Novak enlists Clark's assistance in obtaining evidence to remove a judge from the bench after his bias in two child abuse cases leads to a wrongful arrest.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Aston Villa face Newcastle United at Villa Park. The Villans are unbeaten in their last six Premier League home games against the Magpies.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Nottingham Forest host Arsenal at City Ground. Forest have won their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Liverpool welcome Chelsea to Anfield. Jurgen Klopp is looking for his 200th Premier League win in charge of the Reds.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Tottenham host Brentford at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Spurs have lost just one of their last nine league games against Brentford.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face Gold Coast Suns at Marvel Stadium. Can the injury-hit Bombers put a dent in the Suns' top-eight push?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Geelong Cats take on Richmond at GMHBA Stadium. The Tigers have not won on the Cats' home deck since 2006.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as Brisbane Lions and Port Adelaide face-off at the Gabba. Can the Lions avoid an upset against the resurgent Power?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A clash as Atalanta face Inter at the Gewiss Stadium. A key battle in the title race-can Atalanta stop Inter's momentum, or will the Nerazzurri prevail in Bergamo?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Marco Baroni's Lazio face Paolo Vanoli's Torino at Stadio Olimpico. How will Lazio respond after their 5-0 defeat to Bologna last time out?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as title contenders Napoli host AC Milan at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Milan are unbeaten in each of their last six away matches against Napoli.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as AC Milan take on Raffaele Palladino's Fiorentina at San Siro. The Viola could record a league double over Milan for the first time since 2000/01.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Roma face Juventus at Stadio Olimpico. Can the Giallorossi make it nine league wins in a row, or will Igor Tudor pick up back-to-back wins in charge of Juve?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action from Derby della Capitale as Lazio and Roma battle it out at Stadio Olimpico. Roma could do the league double over Lazio for the first time since 2015/16.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Napoli face Empoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Antonio Conte's Napoli have won just two of their last nine league games.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Parma host Juventus at Stadio Ennio Tardini. The Ducali could avoid defeat in both league matches against the Bianconeri for the first time since 2010/11.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as AC Milan host Atalanta at San Siro. Milan have lost two of their last three league games against the Black and Blues.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: The Serie A title race continues to heat up as league leaders Inter host Roma at San Siro. Can Simone Inzaghi's side secure a big win to pile the pressure on Napoli?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as title contenders Napoli face Torino at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Can Antonio Conte's side take another huge step towards a fourth Scudetto?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Inter look to get their hunt for a 21st Scudetto back on track as they welcome Hellas Verona to San Siro. Verona have never won away against Inter in Serie A.
